problem.title: Why crypto feels like chaos
problem.subtitle: Most people enter crypto the same way: telegram channels, noise, 'buy this urgently' tips, Twitter threads and YouTube videos. The result is a mess in your head instead of a clear picture.
problem.noise_text: Every day there's a new 'token of the day', a new expert, and a new 'last chance to enter'.
problem.emotions_text: Enter on FOMO, exit on panic. A couple of drawdowns â€” and it feels like the market is personally against you.
problem.structure_text: Everything looks like a casino, not a tool: levels, news, and risks don't add up to a picture.

solution.title: Syntra AI gathers the picture and speaks to the point
solution.subtitle: This is not a signal channel. Syntra AI is an assistant that looks at the market and coins like a cold analyst, but explains everything in simple terms.
solution.market_text: What's happening with Bitcoin and altcoins now: growth, pullback, or just noise. No extra charts, just the essence.
solution.coins_text: You write: 'What do you think about SOL?' â€” you get an explanation: what the coin is about, what risks exist, and what to watch.
solution.risks_text: If you want to jump in 'before it's too late', the bot will carefully show where exactly you're risking now.

how.title: How it works
how.subtitle: Works where it's convenient for you: in Telegram without registration or on the web via email. No complex settings â€” choose a platform and start.
how.step1_text: Telegram bot â€” one tap, no registration. Web version â€” quick email authorization in 30 seconds.
how.step2_text: 'What's up with the market today?', 'Tell me about TON', 'Should I keep holding this coin?'
how.step3_title: Get an answer and act consciously
how.step3_text: The bot doesn't promise anything. It explains the picture and helps remove unnecessary emotions.

forwho.title: Who is Syntra AI for
forwho.newbies_text: If you're just getting into crypto and want to understand what's happening and how risky it all is.
forwho.burned_text: If you've made impulsive entries and experienced unpleasant drawdowns â€” here you'll get a calmer view of the market.
forwho.traders_text: If you need a second opinion on an idea, coin, or portfolio â€” without fanaticism and info-gypsyism.

features.title: What Syntra AI can do
features.subtitle: Inside â€” complex mechanics and data, but what matters to you is one thing: the bot helps you organize your thoughts and stop acting 'on a whim'.
features.market_text: Watches market movement and important events so you have context, not just a chart.

personality.title: Bot's character: honest and no hype
personality.subtitle: Syntra AI won't convince you that everything is great. It will tell you if it sees risks, call things by their names, and is a bit sarcastic â€” but always to the point.
personality.quote: Not sure this is your best moment to enter, but if you're ready for volatility â€” okay, here's what I see...
personality.direct_text: Doesn't romanticize. If a coin looks like a bubble â€” it will say so.
personality.rational_text: Relies on data, indicators, and facts. Leaves emotions behind the scenes.
personality.irony_text: Can tease if you're entering at highs or panicking at lows. But it's not anger â€” it's care.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.q1_text: No. Syntra AI doesn't give magical entries. It helps you understand what's happening and highlights risks. The decision is always yours.

faq.q2_text: No. You can come with zero experience. You ask in simple terms â€” the bot also responds in simple terms.
faq.q3_text: The bot doesn't ask for logins, passwords, seed phrases, and doesn't manage your money. It provides information and helps you think.
faq.q4_title: What languages does the bot respond in?

faq.q5_text: Syntra can be a bit sarcastic, but to the point. The goal is not to humiliate, but to help you stop losing on stupid decisions.
